## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e202ed286f9758737c48d4cf1c30f0ece100c6433edd1076e9548baa6a2373d6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'programmablesearchengine' @ 99.2.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
